title: Is wiping ears mandatory in wudu? Wiping inner ear first then outer part Wudu valid? assim al hakeem
transcript: um is it mandatory in order for our wo to be valid that we have to insert our for finger or our index finger inside the ear while at the same time we use our thumb for the outer ear I do these actions separately so first I put the index finger and then with the same water I use my thumb to for my outer finger my outer ear um is this valid yes it is valid and it is man to wipe the ears the prophet said the ears are from the head so once you wipe over your head you don't renew the water with the same hands you just put your index finger inside your ears and the thumbs outside your ear and you do this and that's sufficient for you inshallah
